ygData.subject: Interesting Duel
ygData.msgSnippet: Last night while I was testing out the CoD and DDD with my guildmate we were in duel mode.  While testing, my guildmates would make fun of a bard vs a cleric
ygData.messageBody:
Last night while I was testing out the CoD and DDD with my guildmate we were
in duel mode. While testing, my guildmates would make fun of a bard vs a
cleric how she would wup my ass. She is a lvl 39 clerics that can solo a
Raider in HK just fine. While me being a lvl 35 bard cannot even solo a
hard blue guard, haha. So anyway after my testing (which I posted on
another post), I told her why not duel and find out.

Duel start
Cleric blast u for 121 dmg
bard play fear song.
Cleric runs
Bard chain
Bard beat the crap out of the cleric
Bard play fear song
Cleric runs
Bard chain
Bard beat the crap out of the cleric


I stop the fight because we know who would win from this, hehe.

She gains new respect for bard as a fighter, hehe.

Your Friendly Rogue and Bard
Hammerpaw and Syren Wind
Champions of Norrath, The Rathe
